scripts.prepare: rm -f mustache.json && echo '{}' > mustache.json && mustache mustache.json subgraph.template.yaml subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare:arbone: rm -f mustache.json && echo '{ "isArbitrumOne": true }' > mustache.json && mustache mustache.json subgraph.template.yaml subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 edgeandnode-subscriptions -l v0.0.1
